name: Yallaiah Onteru
title: Senior Full-Stack AI Engineer | Azure Cloud Solutions Architect
professional_summary: Having 6 years of experience building scalable Azure cloud infrastructure storage experiences and AI-powered enterprise solutions using TypeScript, React, Python, and Java across Insurance, Technology, Transportation, and Banking domains with consistent focus on accessibility standards, security best practices, and performance optimization at enterprise scale.

Delivered full-stack AI-powered systems leveraging Azure AI Services, OpenAI GPT models, and LangChain frameworks to build agentic workflows with Model Context Protocol for strategic enterprise customers, achieving seamless agent-to-agent communication and RAG implementation across globally distributed datacenters supporting millions of users with weekly release cadence.

Constructed revolutionary web experiences for Azure Storage management using React, TypeScript, and Node.js with RESTful APIs, implementing continuous improvement processes and CI/CD pipelines through Azure DevOps to support agile development methodologies while embedding closely with customer teams to understand needs and guide adoption of cloud architecture patterns.

Applied prompt engineering techniques and machine learning methods to fine-tune OpenAI GPT models for speech and search capabilities, integrating evaluations and model assessments with Jest testing frameworks to ensure quality across authentication and authorization implementations meeting Microsoft Cloud security screening requirements for production deployments.

Integrated Azure Cognitive Services with responsive design principles to create engaging user interfaces following WCAG accessibility standards, utilizing Docker and Kubernetes for microservices architecture deployed across multiple Azure regions with monitoring and observability tools tracking performance metrics and supporting rapid learning of new concepts and technologies.

Established agent communication protocols using Semantic Kernel and vector databases to power long-horizon task execution with multi-agent systems, partnering with designers and engineers from diverse backgrounds to scope work, sequence delivery, and own technical delivery from prototype to production while maintaining growth mindset and values of respect, integrity, and accountability.

Configured Azure OpenAI Service integrations with LlamaIndex and Guardrails AI for tool calling and agent design patterns, removing blockers early and making trade-offs between scope, speed, and quality to protect delivery timelines while working at startup speed with resources of one of the world's largest companies to help shape the future of the world.

Automated CI/CD pipelines with GitHub Actions for continuous deployment of LLM-powered AI agents using Python and Node.js, codifying working patterns into reusable tools and playbooks that accelerated team velocity, demonstrating strong teamwork in dynamic customer-focused collaborative environment with ability to develop strong relationships with peers and partners across Microsoft.

Deployed Azure Storage services with HTML and CSS foundational implementations supporting cloud storage management solutions, thriving in environment requiring thoughtful engineering and ability to focus on outcomes that matter while collaborating to realize shared goals and innovate to empower others through clarity and follow-through on delivery commitments.

Enhanced API design with TypeScript and JavaScript to build scalable backend services integrated with Azure AI Services for generative AI applications, adjusting plans to protect delivery and embedding problem-solving capabilities to guide customer adoption through technical leadership and self-direction in owning delivery across multiple deployments globally.

Migrated legacy systems to modern Azure cloud infrastructure using Git version control and agile sprints, contributing directly to code when progress depended on it and keeping teams moving through clear communication while deeply committed to understanding and meeting customers' needs with customer empathy and knowledge sharing.

Optimized performance of React applications with TypeScript using lazy loading and code splitting techniques, implementing security best practices for authentication flows and ensuring applications met accessibility requirements through semantic HTML structure and ARIA attributes with continuous evaluation and improvement across development lifecycle.

Streamlined agent-to-agent communication workflows using Model Context Protocol and Agents SDK for prompt orchestration, facilitating retrieval-augmented generation implementations that improved response accuracy while maintaining adaptability to rapidly changing requirements and demonstrating accountability in delivering revolutionary experiences at scale.

Collaborated across Microsoft partnerships to implement agentic workflows with Java backend services, Azure Storage APIs, and Speech services, creating inclusive culture where everyone can thrive at work and beyond while being passionate about products and maintaining mission to empower every person and organization on planet to achieve more.

responsibilities: Built full-stack AI-powered insurance advisory system using React, TypeScript, and Python with Azure AI Services, implementing OpenAI GPT models and agentic workflows through LangChain and LangGraph to automate policy recommendation engine that processes customer risk profiles with agent-to-agent communication via Model Context Protocol, reducing manual review time while ensuring compliance with insurance regulations and accessibility standards.

Deployed CI/CD pipelines using Azure DevOps and GitHub Actions with Docker containerization for Node.js backend services and React frontend applications, establishing weekly release cadence across globally distributed datacenters while implementing Jest testing frameworks to validate agentic workflows, authentication mechanisms, and RESTful APIs supporting millions of insurance policyholders with performance optimization and security best practices.

Configured Azure Storage services infrastructure to manage policyholder documents and claims data at scale, utilizing TypeScript and JavaScript to build responsive design interfaces with HTML and CSS following WCAG accessibility requirements, while partnering with customer teams to understand insurance domain needs and guide adoption of cloud architecture patterns with Git version control for collaborative development.

Applied continuous improvement processes to Azure cloud infrastructure supporting insurance operations, utilizing Node.js and Python to build API integrations that connect legacy policy administration systems with modern AI-powered capabilities through agentic workflows, thriving in environment requiring thoughtful engineering and ability to focus on outcomes that matter.

Integrated vector databases with Azure Cognitive Search to power semantic search capabilities across insurance documentation, implementing prompt engineering strategies for OpenAI GPT models that generate personalized policy explanations using LangChain frameworks, while collaborating to realize shared goals and innovate to empower insurance advisors with AI assistance.

Architected multi-agent systems using LlamaIndex, LangGraph, and Agents SDK for tool calling capabilities, developing agent design patterns that coordinated long-horizon task execution across document processing agents, code generation workflows, and quality validation systems, applying machine learning techniques and model fine-tuning with continuous evaluations through Jest testing frameworks ensuring security best practices and authentication mechanisms.

Collaborated with cross-functional teams to implement search functionality using AWS Elasticsearch for driver and rider matching algorithms, developing RESTful API endpoints with Node.js that handled geospatial queries and real-time availability updates, while ensuring security best practices through authentication and authorization mechanisms protecting user transportation data.

Utilized AWS storage services including S3 and DynamoDB to manage transportation telemetry data at scale, implementing data processing workflows that extracted ride patterns and customer preferences, while developing monitoring solutions that tracked system health and alerted on anomalies affecting transportation service availability.

Supported development of mobile-responsive interfaces using React, JavaScript, and CSS that enabled drivers to accept rides and navigate routes efficiently, implementing Jest testing frameworks validating component behavior and API integrations, while collaborating with teams to optimize user experience and reduce friction in transportation workflows.
